about.description: My name is B. Ramesh, a passionate and result-driven Software Engineer specializing in JavaScript and modern web technologies. I am a quick learner with a strong self-learning attitude and a deep interest in exploring emerging technologies. I'm enthusiastic about solving complex problems and building high-quality, scalable web applications. JavaScript is my core strength. I am open to opportunities that align with my skills, interests, and growth mindset, and I'm always eager to contribute to impactful projects.
about.label: ABOUT ME

list.name: Digital Signage Advertisement Platform
list.description: Designed and developed a scalable platform for dynamic ad campaigns on public screens with role-based workflows, advanced dashboards, and secure OTP verification. Streamlined campaign creation, payment integration, and real-time analytics to enhance operational efficiency.

list.name: Express Bus Application
list.description: Extended Express is a powerful bus booking platform that streamlines trip management for customers, drivers, and admins. It delivers seamless experiences with real-time search, seat selection, and cargo tracking.

list.name: Teja Organic Application
list.description: Teja Organic is an e-commerce platform for organic products, catering to Customers, Sellers, Admins, and Delivery Boys. It offers seamless shopping, detailed analytics, and comprehensive management tools for products, orders, and deliveries.

list.name: Report Builder
list.description: Report Builder is a role-based application with roles: Super Admin, Admin, and User. It provides user management, database handling, query execution, and data export workflows. Each role ensures secure, efficient operations tailored to its responsibilities.

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.subText: If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact me. Iâ€™m open to any work opportunities aligned with my skills and interests.
